Instruction: Stir the hot honey into the mixture in the bowl, and incorporate the flour. Then, fold in the raisins and walnuts. Mix by hand for about 10 minutes using a sturdy spoon. Let the dough rest for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 325°F (165°C). Lightly grease four 8x4-inch loaf pans.
Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C), or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean. The bread should be brown and cracked on top.
